channel.title: Cache editor problem... omg wtf.. [Pi 317]
channel.description:
i downloaded a cache editor to edit my sprites packed into my cache, but on my first try this error came up when i try to replace some of my 317 sprites with i belive 409's? some goes through, but some has the error when i replace it and try to save it.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9rlphx.png[/img]
the first time i select yes, it repacked the cache but it would let me edit it again, and it doesnt show up in-game.
here's is some of what i have
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2v2jvc1.png[/img]
so my question is, should i select yes everytime?... and why does it not allow me to edit my media cache after i select yes and compile it, but it lets me edit the other caches?
and how would i put the new sprites i put into the right spots, meaning fit exactly in.. and how do i get rid of the dark background?
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2nsqp1u.png[/img]

item.title: Cache editor problem... omg wtf.. [Pi 317]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Get the right gameframe in.

Read full topic
